## Sign up
If you haven't previously registered and created an account, you need to click on the ```Register``` navigation option on the main EOplaza portal landing page and this will launch the registration flow.

## Edugain & social login
It is advised to use the ```Edugain & social logins``` option when you do your first sign-in on EOplaza.
More information is available at [signing in](SignIn.qmd) information page.
